attributes.action: Decriminalize the production and personal use of cannabis.
attributes.additional_details:
If cannabis were legalized, up to £900m could be raised annually in taxes, according to the Institute for Economic Research.
In Colorado, legalizing cannabis has actually led to a drop in the number of young people smoking it.
attributes.background:
Cannabis could actually be the safest drug available, after a study found it is actually 114 times less deadly than alcohol, according to the journal, Scientific Reports
Weed can kill cancer cells-The US government has confirmed- and can also shrink some of the most serious types of brain tumours.
